title: Understanding Data Inventory
text: When managing data inventory, it's crucial to consider various aspects that affect data growth and risk.

title: Key Questions to Consider
text: Think about the factors that contribute to the increase in data size and potential risks associated with it.

title: Analyzing Data Growth
text: Consider how the growth in customer base and revenue might relate to data growth.
choices: Are you able to reverse engineer the data sources and understand which teams are responsible for the growth in data size and risk
As the company grows, how does the growth in the customer base and revenue correspond to the growth in data
How fast is sensitive data growing relative to data overall
